text: Hey team, I'm looking to edit this page, i know this pages come from settings > marketing but checkign the pages, i don't see any that looks like the one that appears when the user opts out
This one is like your emails preferences have been updated but i don't have the option to edit the first page

Hey <@U06N68R8Z0Q>, these subscription pages can't be modified like regular website/landing pages (might change in the future). They're mostly build upon one single module which is also quite limited.
The only things you can do by default are text changes and styling via css.  And both of those things can be done only in the design manager (or local dev environment). There is no real visual editing option available. 

As of "the second page" it's not a page but rather an inline thank you message like in every other HubSpot form. The only thing you can change is wording.
